description: ff. 122. 202 x 145; 150 x 100 mm. 13 lin. Rabīʻ II, 594; read before the author-several samāʻ notes on fol. 29a-b, 55a-b, 89b-90a, 91b-92a, 122b. Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 627 (3); the ms. contains juzʼ 2-5 (= bāb 6-40). Incip.: ... الباب السادس فىما ورد عن النبى ... فى اسم الله الاعظم . اخبرنا ابو الحسىن
author: Ibn al-Mufaḍḍal, ʻAlī, 1149 or 50-1214 or 15.
title: Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn fī faḍl al-duʻāʼ wa-al-dāʻīn.
creator: Ibn al-Mufaḍḍal, ʻAlī, 1149 or 50-1214 or 15.
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
